page.title: 11LIFE IN CASTERTON
page.content: Casterton is a{small village}which is very friendly and pleasant to live in. Newer residents comment that when they moved in they were made to feel very welcome.Although some families have lived there for many years,there is some{movement of population}which means that in a small village the {community atmosphere}can be changed. The presence of girls at{Casterton {School}obviously gives an added dimension to normal rural life by their participation in{village {activities.}Before the school moved to Casterton it was housed at Cowan Bridge and was attended in the last century by the{Bronte}sisters.For many residents the lack of public transport is a major problem and the car is essential.The village is very spread out with{detached houses}and bungalows with large gardens.
